title: Tesori d´Oriente Pflege-Geschenkset Ayurveda Cremedusche EdT Cremebad 6 x 3er Sets Set, 3-tlg.
description: Tolle Angebote und Top Qualität entdecken - CO2 neutraler Versand ✔ Kauf auf Rechnung und Raten ✔ Erfülle dir deine Wünsche bei OTTO!
text:
|Hauttypen||alle Hauttypen|
|Inhaltsstoffe||Cremedusche: AQUA, SODIUM LAURETH SULFATE, COCAMIDOPROPYL BETAINE, PARFUM, SESAMUM INDICUM SEED OIL, PHYLLANTHUS EMBLICA FRUIT EXTRACT, CALENDULA OFFICINALIS FLOWER EXTRACT, ALOE BARBADENSIS LEAF WATER, HELIANTHUS ANNUUS SEED OIL, TOCOPHEROL, LAURYL GLUCOSIDE, PEG-7 GLYCERYL COCOATE, GLYCERIN, GLYCERYL OLEATE, COCO-GLUCOSIDE, SODIUM OLIVAMPHOACETATE, STYRENE/ACRYLATES COPOLYMER, TETRASODIUM GLUTAMATE DIACETATE, SODIUM CHLORIDE, CITRIC ACID, SODIUM BENZOATE, POTASSIUM SORBATE, ALPHA-ISOMETHYL IONONE, BENZYL ALCOHOL, BENZYL SALICYLATE, HEXYL CINNAMAL, LIMONENE, LINALOOL|
|Lieferumfang||6 x TESORI DORIENTE 3er Geschenkset Ayurveda|
|Inhaltsstoffe 2||Details Eau de Toilette: ALCOHOL DENAT., AQUA, PARFUM, CALENDULA OFFICINALIS FLOWER EXTRACT, PHYLLANTHUS EMBLICA FRUIT EXTRACT, ALOE BARBADENSIS LEAF WATER, HELIANTHUS ANNUUS SEED OIL, GLYCERIN, TOCOPHEROL, TOCOPHERYL ACETATE, POTASSIUM SORBATE, SODIUM BENZOATE, ALPHA-ISOMETHYL IONONE, BENZYL SALICYLATE, CITRAL, HEXYL CINNAMAL, LIMONENE, LINALOOL.|
|Inhaltsstoffe 3||Cremebad: AQUA, SODIUM LAURETH SULFATE, COCAMIDOPROPYL BETAINE, PARFUM, SESAMUM INDICUM SEED OIL, PHYLLANTHUS EMBLICA FRUIT EXTRACT, CALENDULA OFFICINALIS FLOWER EXTRACT, ALOE BARBADENSIS LEAF WATER, HELIANTHUS ANNUUS SEED OIL, TOCOPHEROL, LAURYL GLUCOSIDE, PEG-7 GLYCERYL COCOATE, GLYCERIN, GLYCERYL OLEATE, COCO-GLUCOSIDE, SODIUM OLIVAMPHOACETATE, STYRENE/ACRYLATES COPOLYMER, TETRASODIUM GLUTAMATE DIACETATE, SODIUM CHLORIDE, CITRIC ACID, SODIUM BENZOATE, POTASSIUM SORBATE, ALPHA-ISOMETHYL IONONE, BENZYL ALCOHOL, BENZYL SALICYLATE, HEXYL CINNAMAL, LIMONENE, LINALOOL|
